short_description: adi v1xtech is a graphic design company based in singapore.
long_description:
overview:think of us as your swat team for solving your product technological problems. we help you unstuck from any sub-optimal product features, and create an upgraded product so you can start selling. we work with businesses who:1. have a market demand waiting for the product to be sold2. have a product / prototype that is almost working but not completed 100%3. have a strong understanding of the product need, and need a swat-like tech team to handle the development4. need to get the solutions done in most optimum, transparent way
how we upgrade your product to market-ready:1. problem-definition to be done from the first meeting, and keep updating up until the end of the project2. treat your product with urgent care with a running start to technical solutions3. transparent action points and results, each of which tackle particular deep-rooted tech issues4. technical work sessions with sales team to manage guarantees and customer's expectations
areas of specialties:1. embedded electronics2. assembly optimization3. ergonomics improvement4. mechanical integrity5. end of life (eol) replacements6. connectivity upgrade7. debugging for unknown problems
when you work with us you will:1. get direct technical pathways to resolve product issues2. build stronger future-proofing for your products within its lifespan3. have embedded team that deeply care for the product's success
business_tags: design | development & product design | financial technology
generated_description: adi is a curated, end-to-end product design and development studio that focuses on breaking boundaries and achieving seemingly impossible projects. with a strong track record of success, adi has helped clients file multiple patents and win awards. the company prides itself on its close relationships with clients, groundbreaking designs, and commitment to projects. adi operates in various industries, including cosmetics, f&b, medical and financial technology, construction, and aircrafts. they specialize in building product iterations, establishing unique methods and technologies, and revolutionizing industries. adai aims to make a positive impact on the world through their work with clients.
generated_business_tags: product development services | unique techniques and methods | revolutionizing the industry | first iteration | curated end-to-end product design | groundbreaking designs
